name: Keep the flame alive (1257thornothing)
description:
A submission for Ludum Dare #46 ("Keep it alive")

You're a young scout camping alone in the forest. You  are afraid of the night, but have a nice campfire to  appease you till dawn.

Just be sure to feed it regularly with wood to keep it alive, or you'll be VERY afraid.

Play with arrows, space to load or drop wood.

The stress bar on the top should not fill completely.
